body_html: I also tried decreasing the size of the input array to 30*30*3, which resulted in each input having a size of 10kb. The memory leak was still present, but it was much less apparent. As expected though, memory usage increased by ~0.01 mb per run.
body_text: I also tried decreasing the size of the input array to 30*30*3, which resulted in each input having a size of 10kb. The memory leak was still present, but it was much less apparent. As expected though, memory usage increased by ~0.01 mb per run.
body: I also tried decreasing the size of the input array to 30\*30\*3, which resulted in each input having a size of 10kb. The memory leak was still present, but it was much less apparent. As expected though, memory usage increased by ~0.01 mb per run.
